resume.mission: I am a seasoned UX designer and developer. I live and die by user-centered design and pragmatic coding practices. I have a soft spot for team building, mentoring, and UX/UI architecture. I am a bit of a mad scientist.
resume.quote: Developing products and process is my passion. I love working closer to the top of the tech stack. I've lead enterprise UI teams with a lean startup mentality. Most of all, I like solving problems.
resume.skills: I know my way around UX design principles, information architecture, and front end performance tuning. Using tools like Angular, Wordpress, CraftCMS, Grunt, Powershell, Sublime text; I've designed and built everything from marketing & ecommerce sites to mobile apps that consume Restful Api's. Most of all, I like solving problems.

timeline.description: I work closely with the cross-functional clinical and sales teams to gather ux design consensus for all of genominds web facing products. I conduct regular design/ideation sessions with stakeholders. I routinely prototype in AdobeXD and in the browser leveraging a brand focused pattern library I built and maintain. I serve as product designer for the Genomind Mental Health Map dna test and activation/onboarding process.
I worked with the founder to establish brand identity and visual guidelines. I created art for all the packaging, glassware, as well as t-shirts and merchandise sold at the brewery.

I designed and developed new features, web marketing materials, and email campaigns with a focus on funnel optimization. I worked closely with marketing stakeholders to develop and refine information architecture, visual design, content strategies and data reporting. I assisted in designing an early stage mobile prototype. I helped standardize delivery workflow and processes for the creative team. I mentored junior designers and content strategists. Using adobe creative suite plus tools like uxpin, git, gulp, and sass I helped to make these projects not only brand focused, but compelling.

Assisted with the implementation of semantic front end ecommerce solutions. I designed web focused products for an internal tools team. I helped define and establishing department wide development standards, front end workflows. As a lead, I mentored developers in implementing user focused design and development approaches with an eye towards emerging browser technologies.

I provided my clients with an array of services including project planning, visual design, user experience design, and front end development for a variety of campaigns and companies. Largely focused on delivering web solutions within several open source content management and ecommerce platforms (Drupal, Wordpress, and Textpattern). I managed project delivery from requirements to QA.
